articles.description: The ban on agents is also set to impact bookings of Air India flights to Canada around the peak summer travel season, especially at a time when the government has announced resumption of regular int'l flights.
articles.content: Air India has banned local agents from booking tickets in the Canada sector to penalise those profiteering from the now surging demand after two years of travel curbs. A section of the travel industr… [+3209 chars]
